DOC.brief_title: An Effectiveness Safety Study Acetaminophen Extended Release Caplets Treatment Osteoarthritis Hip Knee .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo control study evaluate acetaminophen extend release 3900 mg/day compare placebo relief sign symptom osteoarthritis hip knee 12 week . The hypothesis 3900 mg/day acetaminophen extend release superior placebo relief sign symptom osteoarthritis hip knee respect three primary effectiveness endpoint . Propoxyphene Hydrochloride Capsules , 65 mg , use rescue medication subject experience inadequate pain relief . The primary efficacy assessment average change baseline Week 12 WOMAC pain subscale score WOMAC physical function subscale score , subject 's average global assessment response therapy Week 12 . Safety assessment study visit consist monitor adverse event , vital sign , study joint assessment clinical laboratory determination . Treatment consist two acetaminophen 650 mg extend release caplets two placebo caplets , administer orally every 8 hour 12 week .
